summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AcmeSecure cybersecurity marketing website. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend pages load correctly with proper navigation, form submission works, and most UI components function as expected.

ui_bugs.issue: Live chat toggle button has stability issues - element not stable for clicking

passed_tests: Home page loading with all sections (hero, process, products, industries)
Products landing page with all 4 product cards
All 4 individual product detail pages (Device Shield, Risk Intelligence, Compliance & Audit, Threat Response)
Solutions, How It Works, About, and Blog pages loading
Contact form submission with keyboard navigation
CTA buttons linking to contact page
Form validation and success page display
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix live chat widget stability issue - the toggle button has CSS animation or state management issues causing element instability during automated testing
